title: Mounjaro
description: Mounjaro for weight loss, manufactured by Eli Lilly, is a once-weekly injection that contains the active ingredient tirzepatide. Mounjaro makes you feel fuller between meals and lowers your appetite. It is licensed and approved for weight loss in the UK and is available on prescription.

title: Wegovy
description: Wegovy is a weight loss injection taken once a week to help lose weight and maintain weight loss. It contains the active ingredient semaglutide, which mimics a hormone usually released after eating, helping you to feel fuller while following a diet and exercise plan. 1 single pen of Wegovy contains 4 weekly doses that should be taken at the same time and day each week.

title: Mysimba
description: Mysimba weight loss tablets are a medication used to help people who are overweight lose weight. These tablets are available in the UK and you can request Mysimba online through services like St Helens Online Pharmacy.

title: Orlistat
description: Orlistat is a prescription-only weight loss aid that contains the active ingredient orlistat. Orlistat works by preventing the absorption of dietary fat into the body. It is the generic version of the branded medication, Xenical. To get the best results, Orlistat should be taken in combination with a low calorie, low fat diet, and exercise.

title: Liraglutide
description: Liraglutide is a medication used primarily to treat type 2 diabetes and obesity. It is a glucagon-like peptide-1 (GLP-1) receptor agonist, which helps regulate blood sugar levels by enhancing insulin secretion, suppressing glucagon release, and slowing gastric emptying. Liraglutide is administered via injection and can also promote weight loss by reducing appetite. It is marketed under brand names such as Victoza for diabetes and Saxenda for weight management. Liraglutide is typically prescribed when lifestyle changes or other medications are insufficient to control blood sugar or aid in weight loss.
